comment: Alternate proof of ~ fnex , derived using the Axiom of Replacement in the form of ~ funimaexg . This version uses ~ ax-pow and ~ ax-un , whereas ~ fnex does not. (Contributed by NM, 14-Aug-1994.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
